title: Author Meet & Greet: Maria Kovacs
description: Join us for an evening with bestselling author Maria Kovacs as she discusses her latest novel 'Echoes of Eternity'. Get your books signed and participate in an engaging Q&A session.
speaker: Maria Kovacs

title: Children's Story Time
description: Bring your little ones for an enchanting hour of storytelling. Our skilled narrator will bring favorite tales to life, sparking imagination and fostering a love for reading.

title: Book Club: 'The Silent Echo'
description: Dive deep into this month's selection, 'The Silent Echo' by J.K. Rowling. Engage in thought-provoking discussions and share your insights with fellow book lovers.

title: Graphic Novel Workshop
description: Join us for a creative workshop where you can learn how to create your own graphic novel. Materials will be provided.

title: Fantasy Book Fair
description: Celebrate the world of fantasy literature with authors, artists, and publishers. Participate in panels, signings, and workshops.

title: Mystery Evening: Clue Hunt
description: Join us for an interactive mystery clue hunt around the library garden. Gather your friends and solve the clues together!

title: Self-Publishing 101
description: Learn the ins and outs of self-publishing from industry experts. Ideal for aspiring authors looking to publish their own books.
